meanings.sent1: The tsarevich played in the palace gardens.
meanings.sent2: The tsarevich inherited the throne from his father.
meanings.sent3: The tsarevich's favorite toy was a golden crown.
meanings.sent4: The tsarevich was the jewel in the tsar's crown.
meanings.sent5: Every citizen admired the young tsarevich's innocence and charm.

meanings.definition: The title given to the son of a tsar in Russia.
meanings.sent1: When he was born, the tsarevich was immediately given the title.
meanings.sent2: The tsarevich's duties included attending royal events.
meanings.sent3: The tsarevich's official portrait hung in the grand hall.
meanings.sent4: In Russian history, the tsarevich symbolized the future of the monarchy.
meanings.sent5: The tsarevich's presence brought a sense of tradition and continuity to the court.
